articles.author: Thomas Ricker
articles.title: TikTok and Universal Music Group end feud with new agreement - The Verge
articles.description: The home to Taylor Swift, Drake, and Olivia Rodrigo is a returning to TikTok with a deal that offers better protections  against generative AI.
articles.content:
TikTok and Universal Music Group end feud with new agreement
